elements.name: p
elements.content: Welcome to Kama Bistro. These Terms & Conditions (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of our website (https://www.kamabistro.com/) and any related services (collectively, the “Site”). By using the Site, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you should not use the Site.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • “We,” “us,” “our” means Kama Bistro and its affiliates.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • “You,” “your,” “user” means any person accessing or using the Site.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • “Content” includes text, images, graphics, audio, video, menus, promotions, and other materials on the Site.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • “Policies” means any policies referenced herein (e.g. Privacy Policy, Refund Policy).

elements.name: p
elements.content: 2.1 Eligibility. You must be of legal age in your jurisdiction or have permission from a parent or legal guardian to use the Site.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 2.2 Account. Some features may require you to register or maintain an account. You are responsible for keeping your credentials secure and for all activity under your account.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • Use the Site for unlawful or prohibited purposes.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • Upload, post, or transmit harmful, defamatory, obscene, or infringing content.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • Interfere with, disrupt, or attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Site or its systems.

elements.name: p
elements.content: • Use automated means (bots, scrapers) to access or collect data from the Site without express permission.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 3.1 The Site and its contents (including logos, design, content, images) are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 3.2 You may view, download, or print portions of the Site for your personal, noncommercial use only.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 3.3 You agree not to modify, reproduce, distribute, republish, display, or create derivative works from the Site (or its contents) without express written permission from us.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 4.1 Menu, Price & Availability. We strive to keep menus, prices, and availability up to date, but errors, omissions, or changes may occur. We reserve the right to correct errors, cancel or refuse orders, or change specifications without notice.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 4.2 Order Acceptance. Your receipt of an order confirmation (by email or on-screen) does not signify our acceptance of your order, nor does it constitute confirmation of the price or availability. We reserve the right (at our discretion) to accept or decline your order.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 4.3 Catering, Private Events & Reservations. If you use our site to request catering or private events, additional agreements or terms may apply, which you must agree to separately.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 4.4 Gift Cards. If we offer gift cards, they are subject to separate terms, including expiration, non-redeemability for cash, and restrictions.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 5.1 Payment methods accepted (credit card, debit, etc.) will be displayed at checkout or otherwise communicated.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 5.2 You warrant that you are authorized to use any payment method you provide, and that any information you provide is true and correct.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 5.3 You are responsible for paying all applicable taxes, fees, or other charges associated with your purchase, unless otherwise indicated.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 6.1 Because we provide perishable goods or services (food, event services), refunds or returns may be limited or prohibited.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 6.2 Cancellation policies will depend on the context (e.g. reservations, events, catering). We may set deadlines and fees.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 6.3 For issues such as incorrect orders or unsatisfactory delivery, you should contact us promptly; we will evaluate on a case-by-case basis.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 7.1 No Warranty. The Site and all content and services are provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis, without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 7.2 Limitation of Liability. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Kama Bistro (and its officers, employees, affiliates) will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, punitive or consequential damages, or loss of profits, data, or business, arising out of or related to your use or inability to use the Site or services.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 7.3 Indemnification. You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Kama Bistro and its employees, agents, affiliates, from any claims, demands, losses, damages, liabilities, costs, or expenses (including reasonable attorneys’ fees) arising out of your violation of these Terms or your misuse of the Site.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Our Site may contain links to external sites or resources maintained by third parties. We are not responsible for the content or availability of those external sites. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Kama Bistro.

elements.name: p
elements.content: We reserve the right to modify or revise these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective when posted on the Site, with an updated “Effective Date.” Your continued use of the Site constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 10.1 These Terms and your use of the Site shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Chicago.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 10.2 Any dispute arising out of or relating to these Terms or your use of the Site shall be resolved in the courts of U.S. jurisdiction.

elements.name: p
elements.content: 10.3 If any provision is held invalid or unenforceable, that provision will be struck or limited to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.

elements.name: p
elements.content: If any part of these Terms is found invalid or unenforceable, that part will be severed and will not affect the validity of the rest. No waiver by us of any breach or default will be deemed a waiver of any subsequent breach or default.

elements.name: p
elements.content: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at:

elements.name: p
